main event: On March 15, 1952, several observers reported seeing a stationary, odd-shaped unidentified flying object emitting light in California.
interesting points: The object remained in the sky for approximately 30 minutes without moving,The observers reported that the object would turn dark and then light up again,The object was described as being about the size of a medium-sized transport plane,During the observation, several 'little people' were seen watching the object from the ground,The object ultimately took off at a high rate of speed and disappeared from sight.
witness description: observers who saw the object from around 100 feet away and did not approach due to fear
